body.name: NIVEA MEN DEEP Clean Shave Gel with Natural Charcoal, 3 Pack of 7 Oz Cans
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Exceptional Razor Glide: This NIVEA MEN shaving gel provides an exceptional razor glide for a clean, close shave
Softens Hair: This beard shaving gel cleans and softens hair for a comfortable shave and a fresh feeling post-shave
Vanilla and Bourbon Scent: A men's shave gel that offers a masculine, modern vanilla and bourbon scent
Natural Charcoal Enriched: NIVEA shaving gel for men enriched with Natural Charcoal that removes dirt and excess oils from the skin and beard
Includes three (3) 7 ounce cans of NIVEA MEN DEEP Clean Shave Gel
body.description: Take care of your skin with NIVEA MEN DEEP Clean Shave Gel. This shave gel is specially formulated for men to provide an exceptional razor glide for a clean, close shave. NIVEA DEEP Clean Shave Gel for Men is enriched with Natural Charcoal that turns from grey to white in your hands and removes dirt and excess oils from the skin and beard. This shave gel for men cleans skin and softens hair for a close, comfortable shave and a fresh feeling post-shave. Great as an alternative to shaving cream, this shave gel contains Skin Guard Technology that provides a gliding shield on the skin to help protect from nicks and cuts. The NIVEA shave gel offers a masculine and modern vanilla and bourbon scent. A daily shave gel is a key part of a skin care routine and pairs well with NIVEA MEN DEEP Cleansing Beard and Face Wash and DEEP Comforting Post Shave Lotion. To use, pump men's shaving gel onto fingertips and massage directly onto face to form a rich, creamy lather.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nivea Shaving Cream
reviews.reviewText: Was looking for a new shaving cream. Was on Amazon and seen this one. The vanilla bourbon fragrance was a selling point for me. I’ve received the Nivea. Tried it out. Works great. Really do enjoy the fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Now 5 stars, this is an update
reviews.reviewText: Since I posted the review below the product in the can began dispensing at a proper level, it took about a week before the pressure in the container allowed this to regulate correctly. This is a good product and goes a long way, I will purchase again.Initial Review:I began using this product on May 2nd and find the gel to meet or exceed my expectations so one might wonder why not a five star review. The gel gets a five it is the dispensing container that gets a three star and may become a one star and this is the reason.The container is 7 ounces in size (198 grams) and contains a rather large push-button at the top. The first time I pressed to dispense the gel, the quantity that came out was sufficient for two shaves hence it was so fast that it was literally surprising. The next several days I was able to reduce the flow rate by tapping the button quickly (not easy to do it is quite stiff) but not quick enough to get less than about 1 1/2 of what is needed to shave.It is possible that because the can is full of product and propellant that this may slow down as it is used and I can live with that because the gel meets my needs. However if this control issue continues and is also an issue with the other two containers in the three pack I purchased I will have no choice but to drop the review to a one and purchase from another company.
